author: Special Correspondent
text:
The need to protect traditional herbal medicinal practices was stressed by research scholars and traditional medicine practitioners at an awareness programme held in Kalpaganur village near Attur on Saturday.

The awareness programme on the topic “importance of documentation and validation of traditional herbal medicinal practices by traditional healers of Eastern Ghats” was organised by the Department of Biotechnology of Periyar University.

Protecting the traditional herbal medicinal practices through proper documentation and validation will help conserve the traditional herbs, they said.

Human being

The medicinal plants are vital source for the human being as they have been used widely to treat many challenging diseases. There is a need to protect the traditional practices by proper documentation and validation, they added.

The need of documentation was explained by P. Indra Arulselvi, D. Natarajan and M. S. Shivakumar, Assistant Professors of Department of Biotechnology of the university.
title: Need to protect traditional herbal medicinal practices stressed
